cards.title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
cards.description: In my role as a Frontend Developer for Eva Group, I made significant contributions to coding and optimizing websites, focusing on projects in Madrid, Barcelona, and other international markets. I also actively participated in product internationalization to Catalan, English, Basque, and Arabic languages.

cards.title: PRE-PROFESSIONAL SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT INTERNSHIP
cards.description: I collaborated in backend development for the Deep Pharma web platform, handling critical systems such as authentication and authorization with Auth0. Additionally, I contributed to the creation of the user interface using advanced technologies like Next.js and StoryBook.

cards.title: FREELANCE SOFTWARE TECHNICAL WRITER
cards.description: I authored technical articles on software development for 4Geeks, covering a wide range of topics. Leveraging my knowledge in technologies like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Python, and Pandas, I enhanced content quality and clarity of explanations.
